address1: House # 352, Street # 68, MPCHS, Sector E-11/3, Islamabad

partnerDetails.about:
Business Excellence : When & Why

Business Excellence Pvt Ltd was founded in 2010 to serve the electrical and communications systems needs of corporations, but has matured into one of the most successful data center design/build & implementing company. We have stayed abreast of the dynamic technology, climate and security control, reliability assurances and political realities that our clients face – and have become a leader among data center design-build and electrical/cooling specialists. Today we manage all aspects of site selection, design, construction, commissioning and maintenance, audit & compliance of mission-critical data centers. We also continuously anticipate future developments, ensuring that our designs deliver the reliability through redundancy that clients expect now and the scalability and flexibility.

Business Excellence : What We do

Business Excellence Pvt Ltd (BE) provides data center design/build, construction/installation & mission critical facility consulting. BE also installs electrical systems and communications cabling to make your business thrive. Our data center services do not stop at just installations. We pride ourselves on our unsurpassed data center construction design and engineering capabilities.

Our staff of data center engineers, designers and network specialists work with you through the entire process from the initial contact to when your computer room goes live. Through a careful data center assessment, we can determine the optimum mission critical facility design and build it to meet your needs. In addition to engineering and installing mission critical facilities, our data center designers specialize in data center relocation.

If you are going through a move, our data center engineers will dismantle your current construction and assist with a new computer room design for the new location. As a general contractor, we also handle data center consolidation. If your current infrastructure relies on a mission critical design, our build teams can effectively consolidate your infrastructure into a single efficient and economical data center construction accommodate future moves, adds and changes.
